member.name: STORAGE_OFFLOAD_READ_OUTPUT
member.summary: Output structure for the DeviceDsmAction_OffloadRead action of theIOCTL_STORAGE_MANAGE_DATA_SET_ATTRIBUTEScontrol code.

listheader.description: The ranges represented by the token is smaller than the ranges specified in the structures passed in the IOCTL_STORAGE_MANAGE_DATA_SET_ATTRIBUTES control code input buffer. In other words the LengthProtected member is less than the sum of all of the LengthInBytes members of the DEVICE_DATA_SET_RANGE structures passed.

member.name: STORAGE_OFFLOAD_READ_OUTPUT.LengthProtected
member.summary: The total length of the snapshot represented by the token.

member.name: STORAGE_OFFLOAD_READ_OUTPUT.TokenLength
member.summary: Length of the token in bytes.
